data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Marin, Ivan (2017): Athanas alpheusophilus sp. nov. (Decapoda: Alpheidae) - a new Alpheus - associated shrimp from the Russian coast of the Sea of Japan. Zootaxa 4324 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.1.3
